extensionDescription.message: Modifies URL parameters with random values from a predefined list or a random string.

popupTitle.description: The title shown in the popup.

enableExtensionLabel.description: Label for the option to enable the extension.

clearLogButton.description: Label for the button that clears the log of visited URLs.

saveButton.description: Label for the save button in options page.

parameterSettingsHeading.description: Heading for the parameter settings section in options page.
